main event: A green-white, Mercury capsule-like object was sighted over Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on April 27, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 minutes,The sighting occurred at approximately 8:30 PM E.S.T.,The object was described as having a sphere of continuous light in its center,The object was stationary and then moved in a north-easterly direction,The report suggests the object may have been a meteorite.
witness description: The report was sent by an unidentified individual based in Philadelphia.
